name: places/ChIJywUYV5xZwokRr-C17ATwSQY
formattedAddress: 335 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 335 E 9th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I’ve been living in New York City for nearly a decade now and it’s taken me a decade to find the only place I can trust. Layers is small, neatly hidden, and honestly I love it so much I hate the idea of it being conspicuous. However, I have to say, after visiting three times now, that Charles and the salon assistant are so warm and care for your time there. Despite my hair cut technically being an hour later than I’d anticipated, the assistant talked me through when I was getting a wash, when I was getting styled, when I was getting the actual cut. Charles on the other hand is so detailed, so thorough, and so consistent! Plus, the 10% off promo if you pay in cash is always appreciated! A full high end salon experience for less than $80, including tip?! Count me in!!!

originalText.text: Had a hair cut with Sam and love it. Been getting so many compliments since I left the salon!!! The salon is small. Nothing fancy. Not much of wait time. I also had my root color done there . It was OK. I'd reccomend it if you are in for a cut and need a to get roots done too. But the hair cut was a different level. Excellent.

originalText.text: Just got about 2’ off. They did a wonderful job. I loveeeee it! Everyone here is really sweet. They have a variety of small snacks and drinks when you arrive and take time with your individual needs. Really amazing!

text.text: Just got about 2’ off. They did a wonderful job. I loveeeee it! Everyone here is really sweet. They have a variety of small snacks and drinks when you arrive and take time with your individual needs. Really amazing!

originalText.text: Fantastic experience. I asked for a hairstyle that would give my fine, straight hair volume and the style I got is perfect. I feel like he really took his time to get everything right and everyone was friendly and professional. It was extremely reasonably priced as well! Highly recommended.

text.text: Fantastic experience. I asked for a hairstyle that would give my fine, straight hair volume and the style I got is perfect. I feel like he really took his time to get everything right and everyone was friendly and professional. It was extremely reasonably priced as well! Highly recommended.

originalText.text: I had such a lovely experience with Charles! Cannot recommend him more. I got a haircut – I have very thick hair and so most of the haircuts I've got in the past have left my hair looking boxy at the ends. But Charles spend so much time trying to figure out exactly what I wanted and executed exactly that. He didn't do anything half-heartedly – he seems like quite the perfectionist and he really takes pride in his work so he will make sure to do the absolute best he can on any client. He even kept the salon open after hours just so he could finish and style my hair perfectly. He is dedicated and extremely reliable. I am definitely going back and making him a regular. On top of all of that, the haircuts are so reasonably priced. I got a wash, haircut and styling for $70
